name: Big old bag
description:
Participation to the Weekly Game Jam (WGJ 197)
Theme: Delivery

Pitch: An old man has to cross lands to deliver seeds to his fellow farmers. 

Controls:

Gamepad

 left stick = move
A=jump
press B =prepare throw
release B = throw

 Keyboard

qd/ad/arrows= move
space=jump
press shift = prepare throw
release shift = throw

Programming: lazlobarragan
Graphics: moustikouille
Sounds: evilduckk
